Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: As a CLI user (Relying Party) I want manage MULTIPLE claim and proof definitions
Issue.description: Given I am a CLI user and I can create and name JSON proof and claim definitions I should be able to: 1. I should be able to type some command in the CLI to see a list of all my claim and proof defs I've created and named. 3. I should be able to delete a claim definition in the CLI
